title: Looking forward to the Tribunal in OCE..
body:
Friendly reminder to report people who are abusive, even if it's not happening to you.

As someone who used to be depressed and suicidal, I'm glad this wasn't said to me 2 -  3 years ago.

replies.body: my biggest problem is that i have no idea what happens to the person who gets reported, it's been requested so many times to have riot send you a msg to see what happens, but i have no idea why they have not implemented it yet. although i report, for some it may deter them from reporting as they  may think it's a waste of time

* Says "report our zed thxx" 
* Expects not to be verbally abused

it is cancerous people like you, which makes this community so bad, ever considered that it may be your own toxicity which causes zed to react abusively, hence you calling out for reports on him?

Zed should be honored for standing up to a bully like you. 
You deserve to have a terrible norms experience, hope everyone spam calls your lane and instalocks then trolls and you get permabanned because rito found the light.
But saying kill yourself deserves a report. People take this seriously and should not get praise. Your comment is troll, get off the forums.
you link harry potter is LoL, you get off the forums.

It's a name, it doesn't show off how much ego I have. Unlike you, I can see clearly by your writing, your ego is too big. Get a reality check. Also changing the subject to my username shows you have no comeback to my comment.

 "You deserve to have a terrible norms experience, hope everyone spam calls your lane and instalocks then trolls and you get permabanned because rito found the light." 

Your just as bad as the people in** Low **Priority queue.
glad what I said wasn't taken to heart, sorry if I offended you :(

Nothing anyone says over the internet can offend me. For all i know, they could just be a low-life, 2 faced, %%%%%%ed, high school drop out. Not saying you're one, absolutely not. Like the worse someone can do to me is caps lock me to death. You can call me anything and I won't even hesitate to report and get on with my life. TL;DR, it's K.
 
Someone told me I was the worst LoL player they have ever seen and I said "Remeber when I asked for your opinion? Me Neither"

> [{quoted}](name=Justify,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZQX6YxAl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-10T08:52:37.166+0000)

> You deserve to have a terrible norms experience, hope everyone spam calls your lane and instalocks then trolls and you get permabanned because rito found the light.

It's just a shame I can't seem to be able to screen cap LoL in-game, otherwise I certainly would have. He was toxic in champion select, toxic during the game and then mellowed out after the game.

A bully? Yeah I'm a bully for revealing the attitude gamers like you don't seem to want to acknowledge exists. Like I said, I'm thankful I'm not in the same state as I was a few years back, otherwise I just might have after all of the nonsense both teams went through dealing with this guy.

at least you are being honest, don't take my troll posts too serious, on rare occasion it is those people who say those things which are the cause of such rage/tilt/troll. u have my condolences friend

I'm sure all the other servers can't wait for tribunal too.

don't name and shame it's against forum rules.
